channel.title: The "Twilight" Series
channel.description:
I've been reading the Twilight series and i have to say it's a pretty decent series. There are 4 books, and i'm in the middle of 4 right now. The author is Stephanie Meyers, and the series is basically a love story involving vampires. They story line is extremely addicting to where you never want to put the book down, but the way it's written isn't that great. She spends a lot of time describing things i don't think really have any meaning.
The 2 main characters are Bella and Edward. Edward is a vampire, and Bella is a human who moves to a new town with her father, see's Edward and falls in love. Then she begins to think he may be a vampire. You find that part out very soon.
They have a lot of action in them, so it isn't just a sappy love story.
Like i said, the story is very addicting and i can't wait to finish the 4th book. Has anyone read these? What do you think about her writing?

item.title: The "Twilight" Series
item.dc:creator: @srt8 srt8
item.description:
@srt8 wrote:

dds tw1n:

I’ve heard that the series was also very good and to tell the truth I’m acctually going to read it (I realy don’t read.) Also great review!

Thanks. I think you will really enjoy the books. Everyone I know who has read them, loves them.

`Worx:

Isn’t the series a chick-flicky kinda’ve deal? Don’t get me wrong or anything, please.

Yeah, I guess it is kind of a chick book, but it has a lot of action in it. I’ve tried to get my fiancée to read it, but it’s a no go. lol
